summary: In order to secure money for the production of his first film, a young man asks help from a film producer. The producer, however, was involved with pornographic films.
cast: Renos Haralambidis|Yannis Bostantzoglou|Dimitra Papadima|Giorgos Voultzatis|Vana Pefani|Kostas Baras|Costas Xikominos|Dimitris Voyatzis|Panayiotis Panayiotidis|George Alahouzos|George Bakolas|Nitsa Zorba|Panagiotis Panagopoulos|Dionysis Panayotakis|Roulis Alahouzos|Andreas Marianos|George Kordellas|Evagellia Haralambidou|Giannis Haralambidis|Babis Spanos|Anna Paisiou|Thanasis Daskalopoulos|Nikos Bastas|Stefanos Damianakis|Takis|Despina Vernikou
title: No Budget Story
